ch0002_10_kotone/0101_0701_01_10:
Oh, there you are! I’ve been waiting for
you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0002_10_kotone/0101_0701_02_10:
Come on! We’re gonna have so much fun today,
the hours will fly right by!
ch0002_10_kotone/7101_0701_01_10:
My sygna suit was designed to look like the
costumes ancient dancers used to wear.
ch0002_10_kotone/7101_0701_02_10:
It makes me feel light on my feet—like I could
start dancing, too! What do you say? Shall we
give it a whirl?!
ch0002_10_kotone/7102_0701_01_10:
You’ll never guess what happened when I took a
nap with Celebi in the forest the other day...
ch0002_10_kotone/7102_0701_02_10:
When we woke up, the grass right around where
we were sleeping was totally overgrown!
ch0002_10_kotone/7102_0701_03_10:
I wonder if Celebi’s power made it happen...
There’s never a dull moment when Celebi’s around!
ch0002_10_kotone/7103_0701_01_10:
I can always tell how Celebi is feeling by the
way it smells!
ch0002_10_kotone/7103_0701_02_10:
Taking care of my partner Pokémon is my
priority, so I make sure I give Celebi a sniff
every day!
ch0002_10_kotone/7103_0701_03_10:
What, you don’t believe me? Why don’t we have
a battle so you can see for yourself?
ch0002_10_kotone/7104_0701_01_10:
I had a battle with Ethan earlier. He’s gotten a
lot stronger!
ch0002_10_kotone/7104_0701_02_10:
As his friend, I’m really happy about that...
But it kinda makes me mad at the same time,
you know? It’s complicated!
ch0002_10_kotone/7104_0701_03_10:
But when I see how hard Ethan battles, it makes
me want to battle even harder, too!
ch0002_10_kotone/7105_0701_01_10: Sometimes Celebi’s cries sound like it’s singing.
ch0002_10_kotone/7105_0701_02_10:
I actually started imitating it so that we could be
even better friends.
ch0002_10_kotone/7105_0701_03_10:
Once I get a little better at it, I’d love to try
singing for you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0002_10_kotone/1701_0701_01_10:
Celebi picked this up in the forest. I want you
to have it!
ch0002_10_kotone/1701_0702_01_10: Don’t be afraid to use that when you need it!
ch0002_10_kotone/2501_0701_01_10:
When I was younger, my grandma and grandpa
told me the legend of the Ilex Forest shrine back
in the Johto region.
ch0002_10_kotone/2501_0701_02_10:
The guardian that travels through time to protect
the forest in that legend... It must have been
Celebi, huh!
ch0002_10_kotone/2501_0701_03_10:
To think that I have a guardian of the forest as
my partner Pokémon! I guess I must have done
something right!
ch0002_10_kotone/2501_0702_01_10:
Oh! I heard that if you mess around with the
shrine, you might get spirited away!
ch0002_10_kotone/2501_0702_02_10:
I don’t think my Celebi would do something like
that, though... But there could another explanation!
ch0002_10_kotone/2501_0702_03_10:
Maybe instead of spiriting people away, it’s
trying to go back in time with them and play!
ch0002_10_kotone/2511_0701_01_10:
They say that Celebi only shows itself in times
of peace.
ch0002_10_kotone/2511_0701_02_10:
Let’s make sure we protect the peace in our own
time so that Celebi can stick around!
ch0002_10_kotone/2511_0702_01_10:
I hope the peace we have right now continues
on forever.
ch0002_10_kotone/2511_0702_02_10:
I’m not sure what sort of legacy we’ll leave
behind yet...
ch0002_10_kotone/2511_0702_03_10:
but for the sake of those who’ll inherit it, I hope
that it’s beautiful!
ch0002_10_kotone/3001_0701_01_10:
I always make sure my Pokémon and I eat
a hearty breakfast! That way, we always
have the energy to go out and explore!
ch0002_10_kotone/3003_0701_01_10:
Dancing and singing in the forest is so much fun!
How ’bout you come with me and give it a try?
ch0002_10_kotone/3005_0701_01_10:
I just love how beautiful the stars are in a clear
night sky! Wanna come stargazing with me
sometime?
